ComicInfo.Summary:
Chuck, Sarah and Casey break into Mt. Rushmore and save President O'Bannon and finally capture Dr. Blaine Hecht.
Devon tells the story of how he went from being just OK to being Awesome as a child.

ComicInfo.Title: Captain Awesome, Chapter One, Volume One. "A New Beginning." or How I Stopped Being Just "Okay" and Started Being Totally Freaking Awesome: The Origin Story.
